cmp-field.description: Version of configuration as reported by Inform
Force config update regardless of version (if e.g. properties changed)

query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(h) FROM Hosts AS h WHERE h.serialno = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Hosts o WHERE o.serialno like concat(?1, '%')
SELECT OBJECT(h) FROM Hosts AS h WHERE h.url = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Hosts o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Hosts o WHERE o.hwid = ?1 AND o.serialno like concat(?2, '%')
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Hosts o WHERE o.url like concat(concat('http://',?1),'/%') OR o.url like concat(concat('http://',?1),':%') OR o.url=concat('http://',?1)
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Hosts o WHERE o.hwid = ?1 AND o.serialno = ?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Hosts o WHERE o.url like concat(concat('http://',?1),'/%') OR o.url like concat(concat('http://',?1),':%') OR o.url=concat('http://',?1) ORDER BY o.lastcontact DESC
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Hosts o WHERE o.customerid=?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Software AS s WHERE s.hwid = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(s) FROM Software AS s WHERE s.version = ?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Software o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Software o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Configuration o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Configuration o WHERE o.hwid=?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Script o

cmp-field.description: CPE class as reported in Inform request

query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM HardwareModel o order by o.DisplayName
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM HardwareModel o WHERE o.oui = ?1 AND o.hclass = ?2 AND o.version IS NULL
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM HardwareModel o WHERE o.oui=?1 AND o.hclass=?2 AND o.version=?3
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM HardwareModel o WHERE o.hclass=?1 AND o.version=?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DSLStats o WHERE o.hostid=?1 AND o.time>=?2 AND o.time<=?3 ORDER BY o.time
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DSLStats o WHERE o.hostid=?1 AND o.time=?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DSLStats o WHERE o.hostid=?1 AND o.time<?2

cmp-field.description: Interval in hours during which param values are saved once

query.ejb-ql: SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DeviceProfile o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM ATMErrorsStats o WHERE o.hostid=?1 AND o.time<?2
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM ATMErrorsStats o WHERE o.hostid=?1 AND o.time=?2
SELECT MAX(o.time) FROM Backup o WHERE o.hostid=?1 AND o.type=1
SELECT COUNT(o) FROM SoftwareDetail o WHERE o.hwid=?1 AND o.version=?2
SELECT COUNT(o) FROM DataModel o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DataModel o WHERE o.name=?1 OR o.name =concat(?1,'.') OR o.name =concat(?1,'.{i}.') OR o.name =concat(?1,'.{i}')
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DataModel o

SELECT o.name FROM DataModel o WHERE (((o.name LIKE CONCAT(?1,'%.') OR o.name LIKE CONCAT(?1,'%')) AND o.name NOT LIKE CONCAT(?1,'%_._%')) OR (o.name LIKE CONCAT(?1,'%.{i}.') AND o.name NOT LIKE CONCAT(?1,'%_._%.{i}.'))) AND NOT o.name=?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DataModel o WHERE o.name=?1
SELECT o.name FROM DataModel o WHERE o.type='object' AND o.name LIKE ?1 ORDER BY o.name

SELECT o.name FROM DataModel o WHERE (((o.name LIKE CONCAT(?1,'%.') OR o.name LIKE CONCAT(?1,'%')) AND o.name NOT LIKE CONCAT(?1,'%_._%')) OR (o.name LIKE CONCAT(?1,'%.{i}.') AND o.name NOT LIKE CONCAT(?1,'%_._%.{i}.'))) AND NOT o.name=?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DeviceProfile2Software o WHERE o.hwid=?2 AND o.profileName=?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM DeviceProfile2Software o WHERE o.profileName=?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM HostProperty o WHERE o.parentId=?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM ProfileProperty o WHERE o.profilename=?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Service o
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Service o WHERE o.type=?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM Host2Service o WHERE o.hostid=?1
SELECT OBJECT(o) FROM ServiceProperty o WHERE o.serviceid=?1
